guest_info.name: Tara Meier
guest_info.title: Real Estate Marketing Technology Expert
guest_info.specialty: Brand and identity development, online presence, reputation management, social media strategy, AI and automation

problems_addressed.specific_problem: Lack of online presence and engagement
problems_addressed.solution_summary: Agents should consistently update their online profiles, engage on social media, and provide valuable content to their audience.

problems_addressed.specific_problem: Ineffective use of social media for lead generation
problems_addressed.solution_summary: Identify your audience's struggles and create content that addresses their questions and interests using tools like ChatGPT.
Batch content creation by setting aside dedicated time for planning and recording to reduce stress and improve consistency.

target_avatars.relevance: This episode provides strategies for improving online presence and using AI to enhance marketing efforts.
target_avatars.key_takeaway: Leverage AI tools like ChatGPT to streamline content creation and better engage with your audience.

target_avatars.relevance: Offers advanced strategies for digital advertising and audience targeting.
target_avatars.key_takeaway: Utilize digital advertising strategically by creating custom audiences and layering marketing efforts.

clip_worthy_moments.quote: Gone are the days when just posting a house for sale is going to be exciting. People want to be entertained, informed, and inspired.
clip_worthy_moments.why_clipworthy: Challenges the traditional approach to real estate marketing and emphasizes the need for engaging content.
clip_worthy_moments.suggested_hook: Are your real estate posts just getting scrolled past? Here's why you need to change your strategy.

clip_worthy_moments.quote: AI can really help you craft a compelling bio, build your brand, and draft copy for your website and social media posts.
clip_worthy_moments.why_clipworthy: Provides a clear, actionable use of AI that agents can implement immediately.
clip_worthy_moments.suggested_hook: Want to save time and boost your real estate brand? Here's how AI can help.

key_tactics.tactic: Use ChatGPT to identify audience needs and create content.
key_tactics.context: Ask ChatGPT for common questions and concerns of your target audience to guide content creation.

key_tactics.tactic: Batch content creation to save time.
key_tactics.context: Set aside specific times for planning and recording content to maintain consistency.

quotable_insights: People want to be entertained, informed, and inspired, not just sold to.

episode_summary: In this episode, Tara Meier shares insights on leveraging AI and digital strategies to enhance real estate marketing efforts. She emphasizes the importance of a strong online presence, engaging content, and strategic digital advertising. Tara provides actionable tips for using AI tools like ChatGPT to streamline content creation and improve audience engagement.
